qas.question: What do critics claim people of color have?
What has the Brazilian media been accused of?

answers.text: hiding or overlooking the nation's Black, Indigenous, Multiracial and East Asian populations.

qas.question: What ethnicity of actors are mainly used for shows in Brazil?
What is another word for "Light Skinned"

context: Critics note that people of color have <a0_0>limited media visibility<a0_0/>. The Brazilian media has been accused of <a1_0>hiding or overlooking the nation's Black, Indigenous, Multiracial and East Asian populations.<a1_0/> For example, the telenovelas or soaps are criticized for featuring actors who resemble <a2_0>northern Europeans<a2_0/> rather than actors of the more prevalent Southern European features) and light-skinned <a3_0>mulatto<a3_0/> and mestizo appearance. (Pardos may achieve "white" status if they have attained the middle-class or higher social status).
